content.body: I wonder if this distinction about domain as part of origin is relevant to developers
I am thinking in particular about what the MDN docs should say

> Two URLs have the same origin if the protocol, port (if specified), and host are the same for both. You may see this referenced as the "scheme/host/port tuple", or just "tuple". (A "tuple" is a set of items that together comprise a whole â€” a generic form for double/triple/quadruple/quintuple/etc.)
